listing.listing_description:
Hidden away in the Santa Monica Mountains, lush foliage gives this property a completely private feel. Modern details meet old fashioned charm in the elegant lavender, gold, and pewter decorated home. Nearby attractions and historic Hollywood are within walking distance; put your movie knowledge to the test at Universal Studios or pay homage to your favourite stars on the Walk of Fame.

The backyard balcony is a serene spot to sit and enjoy a cup of joe in the mornings, with views of Los Angeles and beyond. Inside, rooms seamlessly flow from one to the next, with an artful, winding staircase leading up to the celebrity-worthy bedrooms. The media room is a great place to kick back with a favourite film, while the office space is a quiet spot to open a book or check emails. Cool down in the turquoise pool—swimming laps or snapping insta-worthy vacation pics. Afterwards, uncork a bottle of vino and toast with your crew around the patio fireplace, encircled by Adirondack chairs.

In true Los Angeles fashion, tropical palm trees detail the lush landscaping. An outdoor cooking and alfresco dining area is shaded by a vine-covered pergola. While it may seem like you’re secluded away, Rodeo Drive, golfing, and the iconic amusement park at Santa Monica Pier are only minutes away by car. Hike up nearby Runyon Canyon Park and be exposed to panoramic views of the city below or grab a gourmet ice cream and walk along the Venice Canals.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Registration number: HSR19-003450

listing.listing_description:
K0001 - City Permit #3746 - TOT#3085

It doesn’t get much more charming than Casa Grande Tennis Estate. This Spanish Colonial-style residence in Palm Springs will transport you with its elegant architecture and colorful detail. It’s a wonderful private hideaway for a relaxed holiday with family or a stylish base for exploring the Desert Cities with friends.

Tucked behind walls for a secluded, romantic feel, the estate boasts a swimming pool, hot tub, al-fresco lounging and dining areas, an outdoor wet bar and a barbecue—and, as its name suggests, a regulation-size tennis court where you can pretend you’re at Indian Wells. Spend evenings around the firepit or inside by the wet bar, pool table, baby grand piano, TV and Wi-Fi.

Rich in vibrant tile, carved wood details and refined furnishings, Casa Grande evokes a sense of traditional southern California luxury. Several living rooms give you the choice of multiple places to have a conversation or watch TV, while the dining table for fourteen is perfect for getting everyone together. The fully equipped kitchen is equally inviting, with a generous center island.

There are five bedrooms in the main house at this expansive vacation rental, one in a first casita and two in a second casita. All five main-house bedrooms have king beds; three have en-suite bathrooms and two share a hall bathroom. The first casita has one bedroom with a queen bed, an en-suite bathroom and a kitchenette—ideal for couples wanting a honeymoon-style escape. The second casita has two bedrooms with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, plus a shared kitchenette.

Casa Grande Tennis Estate is located in The Mesa, an exclusive Palm Springs neighborhood known for being a favorite with celebrities. From here, it’s a 10-minute walk to some of the hottest spots on South Palm Springs and a 5-minute drive to shopping, dining and entertainment in downtown Palm Springs.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located on Malibu’s prestigious coast, this incredible five-bedroom enjoys its own private slice, inaccessible by the public, of Las Flores Beach. With endless views of the Pacific Ocean from its multi-level balcony and spacious interior, Beachfront Beauty is perfect for a family getaway, vacation with friends, and any other occasion worth celebrating in style. Nearby, you’ll love the relaxed beach community atmosphere of Malibu, right with high-end shopping, fine dining, and vibrant nightlife. For even more world-class attractions, follow the coast East a few miles to the bustling metropolis of Los Angeles.

This stylish villa boasts incredible ocean views and barrier-free access to its many balcony openings, inviting fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to flow freely within the minimalistic-chic interior. High-end electronics and designer furniture decorate the soothing, creamy tones of the common spaces, while in the kitchen, the state of the art appliances are sure to inspire your inner chef. The master bedroom enjoys a California King-bed, en-suite with jetted tub, a private balcony, and spectacular ocean view.

Beachfront Beauty’s estate is split between the four-bedroom Main House, which features panoramic ocean views across its open concept interior and five-level balcony. The fifth bedroom is located in the private Guest House, which is outfitted with two beds, an en-suite, a full kitchen, living area, and ocean view-balcony. The villa features indoor parking for two vehicles, alfresco and formal dining for eight, and the use of kayaks, available on the beachfront.

Although you’ve got your own private beachfront, you’ll surely want to check out some of the coast’s other beautifully scenic beach areas, like Santa Monica Pier and Venice Beach, both are just ten miles from home. If you’re in the mood to explore, Topanga State Park is perfect for family hiking excursions. If you’re traveling with kids or the young at heart, Universal Studios is always a great bet. And, of course, Los Angeles, Hollywood, and Beverly Hills are just a few miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Modern elegance meets simplicity and a great location with this hillside LA villa. Located in a renowned section of the Hollywood Hills, the peaceful Laurel Canyon area offers chilled vibes while retaining excellent access to the Sunset Strip. With interior space maximized, guests can enjoy an airy terrace and cooling pool, with parks, restaurants, hip bars and shopping options just minutes away.

Entering into LA Supreme, guests are greeted with the clean aesthetic of an open welcome space, with a huge window beyond offering a view of the LA sunshine and Hollywood Hills. Sparse but stylish decor, including driftwood furniture and tastemaker artwork adorn the central living area, while a huge island adds character and utility to the kitchen area. The stone flooring gives way to softer, welcoming furnishings in the living room section of the villa, where soft seating allows for ideal relaxation. On the wraparound terrace outside, guests can savor delightful brunches at the convenient alfresco dining table, or relax in the sunny afternoon in the supplied recliners, which offer an impressive view of downtown LA in the distance.

This part of LA offers a wealth of day-trip options for guests. Despite its proximity to such a major city, local options range from bracing canyon walks and hikes, to horseback excursions and ranch visits. The sheer number of bars, restaurants, art galleries, art installations, and theatres in the nearby districts makes for an almost limitless number of options for guests, while the nearby Walk of Fame and iconic Griffith Observatory are always popular options. Taking in the glittering lights of the City of Angels from the terrace is a great way to end your day, with the entire panorama of this fabled city spreading out in front of guests as night falls.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Bask under the Lone Star sky at this ranch-style villa in Texas Hill Country, just 8 miles from Downtown Austin. Nestled on 5 acres of private land, the home features generous outdoor living areas with a hot tub, pool, veranda, and fire pit for late-night festivities. Inside, rustic country charm gets a contemporary upgrade in the poker-friendly games room and chef-grade kitchen with bar.

Savor long afternoons in the Texas sun, plunging into the water and playing basketball at the in-pool hoop. Sizzle local meat and veggies on the barbecue and gather for alfresco meals on the veranda. Watch the big game in the covered lounge area with outdoor fireplace, and sip cocktails around the fire pit as the sun sets over the hills. Then crawl into the hot tub for a nightcap soak under the vast dome of stars.

The centerpiece of the interior is a vaulted living room with timber beams, an impressive fireplace in white stone, and a generous leather sectional for the whole family. The open, light-filled kitchen features chef-grade appliances, beautiful details like an exposed-brick backsplash, and an island bar for breakfast or cocktail-shaking. After dinner, play Texas Hold'em in the games room or ping-pong on the patio, and start the next day off with a workout in the gym.

Five bedrooms (including 4 with ensuite bathrooms and 2 with a kid-friendly vibe) offer comfortable accommodations for families, groups of friends, or colleagues on a business retreat. The master opens directly to the pool terrace and includes a dual vanity and clawfoot tub in its bathroom.

From this secluded oasis, you're about 10 minutes from the fairways of Barton Creek Coore & Crenshaw, and about 8 to 11 miles from a wide range of unique destinations. Catch some world-class music at Zilker Metropolitan Park, take a dip in Barton Springs Pool, and hop among the bars and eateries of Downtown Austin.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This gorgeous Bel Air villa offers exquisite privacy and rustic enchantment just minutes from some of the finest attractions in Los Angeles. Beautiful alfresco living areas invite you to lounge and dine in the Southern California sun, while the gorgeous interior melds rural charm with modern amenities to create an ideal ambiance for family and friends. Seven bedrooms accommodate family reunions, destination wedding guests, or unforgettable gatherings with friends.

The ample yard and terrace evoke the Hamptons at summertime. Walk across the lush lawn and plunge into the sparkling swimming pool. Luxuriate on stylish loungers and sway on the charming tree swing. Return to the beautiful brick patio for an afternoon barbeque and alfresco meal, and sip a fine wine in the lounge with sweeping views of the Brentwood hills.

Lovely doors open from the terrace to the open-plan kitchen and dining area, inviting an exquisite alfresco ambiance inside. Cook delicious meals in the rustic kitchen with high-end appliances, and relish them at the wooden farmhouse table. At night, sip digestifs by the fire, watch a favorite film in the media room, and play a game of pool in the parlor with vaulted wood ceilings. If you need a quiet niche for work or study, the lovely office suite is ideal.

The villa's main house features six bedrooms: four with king beds, one with a queen, and one with two twins. Five of these six bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms. The master suite includes a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. There is also a guesthouse with queen bedroom, kitchenette, ensuite bathroom, and doors to the terrace.

Bel Air & Beyond offers an outstanding balance of privacy and convenience, with the Getty Center just two-and-a-half miles from your door and myriad other worldclass attractions—including Santa Monica Beach and Pier, Venic Beach, Universal Studios, and Griffith Observatory—within eight to twelve miles.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Registration number: HSR19-002462

listing.listing_description:
Calling all outdoor enthusiasts: your choice of watersports and a private boat dock await on rippling Lake Austin. A contemporary yet comfortable interior is comprised of plump leather furniture, stainless steel accents, and warm wooden details. Located mere miles from the heart of downtown, this serene getaway is close to modern museums, a thriving entertainment scene, and piquant Texas flavours.

A natural stone pathway leads to the double front doors. Soaring windows allow natural light to stream in from all angles. Inside, artful light fixtures and geometric décor add character to the flowing living space. An alfresco kitchen is an easy spot to prepare lunch while the kids splash around in the swimming pool. Later, uncork a bottle of Cabernet Sauvignon while gazing up at the starlit sky from the rooftop patio. Towering trees form a dense perimeter while tropical greenery surrounds the estate and potted plants bring the garden indoors. 

The views of the city are not to be missed from nearby Mount Bonnell’s peak. Hiking and biking trails crisscross through Zilker Metropolitan Park where you can also bathe in natural springs, rent a kayak, play sand volleyball, or ride the miniature Zilker Zephyr train.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A glass kitchen wall unfolds to views of Colorado’s Flat Top Mountains at this bright modern-mountain home in Steamboat Springs. It’s tucked behind a grassy rise for a private feel in the front; in the back, slopes and sky stretch out before the deck. Walk to Trailhead Lodge and drive 4 minutes to the Steamboat Ski Resort base. 

Get your fill of the mountain air on a pergola-covered deck with an alfresco sitting area and barbecue. You’re also welcome to use the heated outdoor swimming pool, 3 outdoor hot tubs, and firepit at Trailhead Lodge. Stretch out in the lodge’s fitness center and face off against friends and family in the games room. 

Tall ceilings, oversized windows, and cool grey tones give this luxury property a bright, airy vibe. It’s laid out around an open-concept great room with a sitting area overseen by a playful bear artwork, a dining table for 6, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar that opens to the deck. Let kids watch a movie in the separate lower-level living area while the grown-ups sip something from the wine fridge. 

This vacation rental’s 4 bedrooms are spread out over 3 levels. If you’ve brought the whole gang on holiday, there are 2 available bedrooms with twin-over-double bunk beds. 

Grab gear from the mudroom or 1-car garage and walk to Trailhead Lodge to board the Wildhorse Gondola for Gondola Square and its ski school, honeymoon-worthy restaurants, and lively apres-ski scene. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.strong: For guests traveling in the warmer months, please note that air conditioning is not available at this property.
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

listing.listing_description:
With a golf course in the foreground and the mountains in the background, White Cloud 16 Sun Valley offers iconic Idaho views—and a great location to match, with the first hole a short walk away and the Sun Valley Village center and ski resorts a few minutes away by car. A soaring great room, three bedrooms and luxury features make this vacation rental the perfect choice for a family, a group of friends or even a couple on honeymoon.

The villa has its own private outdoor area with a barbecue and fireplace, as well as plenty of room to relax indoors, whether in front of the fireplace or around the kitchen table.

An open layout and thoughtful furnishings give the townhouse a contemporary mountain-lodge look. The soaring ceiling in the great room echoes the wide-open Western skies, while exposed wood beams and a stone fireplace surround are classic touches. Claim a spot close to the hearth on the sectional or armchairs in the sitting area, chat with the cook from a seat at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen, and gather everyone together for a meal at the round dining table.

Three suite-style bedrooms—two with king beds and one with a queen bed—ensure a comfortable holiday. The rooms are spread out over the home’s three levels, making each one a quiet haven after a day on the slopes or the course.

Active guests will appreciate the villa’s location, a 2-minute walk to the nearest golf course, 3 minutes from the village center and about 1.5 miles from the closest ski area. Of course, once you’ve played one course or skied one mountain, there are other options to choose from. For a different experience, make the drive into Ketchum for shopping, gallery-hopping and dining, or to the Sawtooth Botanical Gardens for a closer look at plants that flourish in Sun Valley’s high altitudes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Situated high in the hills of the historic and eclectic Mesa neighborhood, On The Rocks represents an original 1959 Hugh Kaptur AIA design often noted as one of the finest examples of modern hillside architecture in Palm Springs. Have your vacation, your way in the epitome of Palm Springs architecture, carefully reimagined to foster an exclusive resort experience reserved only for the most discerning guests. The glory of California’s Desert Cities await!

Have a splash in the pristine saltwaters of the infinity swimming pool with built-in hot tub. The grounds are rounded out with an alfresco dining set, a barbeque and a fire pit. The pool deck is spacious and includes plenty of sun loungers. The interiors of On the Rocks feature a bar and a sound system. Who is the consummate entertainer in your entourage?

Having undergone a multi-year renovation, On The Rocks has been reimagined by noted architect Jim Schmidt. The home’s original character remains intact, while introducing the use of raw industrial steel, clean architectural lines and ultra modern finishes. Featuring 200-degree views of three mountain ranges, the cityscape of Palm Springs and the valley floor, On The Rocks boasts a most unique and stunning vantage point. The interior furnishings, art pieces and decorations are both majestic and cool. The fully equipped kitchen includes a large center island breakfast bar.

Three exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the bedrooms include king beds, en-suite bathrooms and televisions. The first master suite features an out of this world alfresco shower and a private terrace with outdoor furniture. Each suite displays a unique style and vision to keep things from getting too predictable.

During your stay at On the Rocks, you will be just a few minutes by car from both the Mesquite Golf and Country Club as well as the Bel Air Greens. You will also be within walking distance of the lush Morten Botanical Garden. A little further away you will find Old Town La Quinta with its lovely boutiques and historical sites. Book now with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Palm Springs City ID: 3943

listing.listing_description:
Perched along the 13th fairway of the Jack Nicklaus-designed Old Greenwood Course, this home features superbly equipped living areas, family-friendly bedrooms, and a prime location balancing privacy and convenience. Play some of the finest golf in California and return to alfresco dinners from the barbeque. Ski the slopes of Northstar and reward your muscles in the open-air hot tub.

Caleb Drive evokes a vintage alpine ambiance with its natural wood surfaces, exposed beams and trusses, and pine forest setting. Ample outdoor living areas include a terrace with dining table and sweeping views of the golf course. Inside, the vaulted great room features a classic stone hearth and an open kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances and a gorgeous granite-slab breakfast bar. Young kids will love the bunk room with private TV lounge and play area. 

In addition to Old Greenwood, you’re also within close range of Schaffer's Mill Golf Club, and about 5 miles from downtown Truckee. Ski lovers will discover some of the best powder and pistes in the American West at Northstar and Squaw Valley.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Like stones in a riverbed, pavers lead the way past hedges and trees to the front door of this mid-century ranch home close to Austin’s must-sees. The L-shaped layout creates space for an open-concept great room and wraps around tucked-away outdoor living areas including a pool. Bring your swimsuit on the 2-minute drive to Zilker Metropolitan Park for a dip in its 3-acre Barton Springs Pool. 

Savor the Texas sunshine on a row of loungers in the private backyard, then cool off in a pool and hot tub hidden behind stands of bamboo. Sip cocktails or local craft brews in the Tulum chairs before sitting down to a meal from the barbecue at the alfresco dining table for 10. A streaming cable TV and Wi-Fi make evening entertainment a snap. 

The heart of this vacation rental is an open-concept great room with a sitting area, dining table for 8, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. The sitting area is all mid-century glam, from its tufted blue sofas and leather poufs to its metallic accent table and walnut armchairs. The same deep blue is echoed in the kitchen cabinetry. 

This luxury property has 1 master bedroom with a king bed and ensuite bathroom, 1 bedroom with a queen bed and ensuite bath, and 1 bedroom with a queen bed and access to a hall bathroom. Like the great room, the bedrooms take their style cues from mid-century classics, such as tufted benches and Sputnik chandeliers. 

A holiday at this villa puts you a 2-minute drive from Zilker Park, an urban oasis that stretches over more than 350 acres. Bring the family for a canoe trip on Lady Bird Lake, take a honeymoon from the everyday with a swim in Barton Springs Pool, and, if you’re in town, stop by for the annual Austin City Limits music festival.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Double glass doors invite vistas of snow-covered fields and Colorado peaks inside this lofty Steamboat Springs home. Its angular contemporary architecture makes for airy spaces on a grand scale, but even the smallest details have been seen to, like the glass fireplace screen. Walk 4 minutes to Trailhead Lodge and board the Wildhorse Gondola on your way to the day’s first ski run. 

Leave gear in the mudroom before settling in for an apres-ski soak in the private outdoor hot tub or facing off against friends and family over the ping-pong and foosball tables inside. Guests of this luxury property are also welcome at the heated swimming pool and hot tub at Trailhead Lodge. 

A two-story ceiling and double doors to the terrace flood this vacation rental’s great room with light. Leather seating is a warm, inviting touch in the sitting and dining areas, while a marble breakfast bar lends polish to the fully equipped kitchen. There’s a separate lower-level media room with a wet bar, and for larger parties on holiday together, a bunk room with 3 double bunk beds. 

This villa is a 4-minute walk from Trailhead Lodge. From here, take the Wildhorse Gondola up to Gondola Square, which is both ski-resort base and a hub of shopping and dining. After a day in the powder, go for a sleigh-ride dinner, drive into downtown Steamboat Springs, or reserve a honeymoon-worthy snowshoe by moonlight. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist. 

Set on a wild Colorado hillside, this villa sets guests amongst the dynamic splendor of this mountain state. With comfortable interiors, sunlit kitchen and restful living room, guests can take in a peerless view of the surrounding valley from the upper deck. Offering easy access to the Wildhorse Gondola and the local ski slopes, while the welcoming town of Steamboat Springs is just minutes away.

The Rocky Mountains are in full view at all times at this mountain getaway, with the peaks of Buffalo Mountain and Copper Ridge catching the morning sunrise in a blaze of glory. Linger over a reviving breakfast at the modern and fully-equipped kitchen before taking the air on the upper level terrace, where bracing Colorado air will fill your lungs with the possibility of adventure. The finely outfitted living room, complete with entertainment system and a nice touch of Western style makes the perfect spot for relaxing after a day spent speeding down the slopes or simply exploring nearby mountain towns. Watch the sun sink into a brilliant red sunset on the comfortably outfitted deck with a cold drink in hand, as the villa’s barbecue softly grills a delicious supper.

Steamboat Springs is particularly renowned for its skiing, with the impressive heights of the nearby slopes on Mount Werner dominating the valley. Guests at Flat Tops can make the most of swift access, sweeping up the valley via a private gondola to speed across fresh powder during refreshing morning outings. Beyond skiing, guests can make the most of what the mountains have to offer, from snowmachine tours in the winter to energetic hikes and nature-trail outings in the warmer months. Steamboat Springs, right on the villa’s doorstep, offers a broad range of bars and riverside restaurants to choose from - ideal for rest and good times after a day spent in the great outdoors.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Steal away to a unique private sanctuary in a coveted location at Flat Iron Retreat. This gorgeous contemporary home has one-of-a-kind luxury amenities, more than 6,000 square feet of living space that can accommodate up to ten friends or family members. Plus, its setting in The Colony at Park City puts you in an exclusive location close to the Flat Iron ski lift at Park City Mountain Resort.

The estate impresses both outside and in with a furnished deck featuring a barbecue, firepit and hot tub. Inside, let the glass elevator whisk you between the great room and a lower-level entertaining area, where you’ll find a lounge with a bar and pool table, an inviting home theater and an indoor sports court that can be used for basketball, racquetball and “wallyball” (a fast-paced game similar to volleyball that will quickly become part of your happy holiday memories).

Sleek contemporary interiors also set this vacation rental apart. A wall of windows, sloped ceiling and open-concept layout lend the upper-level great room a bright, welcoming feel. The furnishings make it easy to relax: cozy up to the stone fireplace in a trendy ikat-print chair, sip a drink on one of the barstools facing the fireplace and TV, or relive the day’s adventures around the dining table. Custom cabinets, marble counters and state-of-the-art appliances mean the fully equipped kitchen is both stylish and functional.

Flat Iron Retreat has two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed, walk-in closet and mountain views, and a kids’ room with three queen bunk beds and its own lounge area. A guest room has a queen Murphy bed and access to a bathroom off the home theatre.

If the amenities weren’t enough, ski-in, ski-out access to the Flat Iron ski run for intermediate and advanced skiers makes the honeymoon from real life complete. It’s also a short drive to the Canyons lifts, the Park City Mountain Resort base and historic Main Street in downtown Park City. Be sure to take a day trip to Utah Olympic Park, where you can tour the facilities and even try a bobsled run yourself.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The City of Palm Springs ID# 2891

Nestled in the majestic San Jacinto mountains, Villa Cahuilla sits above the city, while providing easy access to top golf courses, Moorten Botanical Garden and Palm Springs. Sitting poolside, or in the spa, while overlooking the city, defines the carefree spirit of Palm Springs. Exquisite design allows seamless indoor & outdoor living, while gorgeous gardens populate the grounds. Live it up with Luxury Retreats!

The heated swimming pool features four waterfall fountain features and offers unobstructed views of Palm Springs and the surrounding desert. The private grounds feature four separate outdoor fire features, ancient rock formations and stunning multi-tiered gardens that include mature cacti. Dine alfresco at the outdoor table for twelve, or belly up to the outdoor bar and barbeque. The property also showcases an eight person hot tub, literally perched on the edge of the mountain. The hot tub's fire feature and multi-color mood lighting are perfect complements for an evening of champagne and stargazing.

This vacation rental is set apart by its sublime, romantic ambience. The lighting schemes and fireplaces cast a dreamy spell amid sparkling contemporary furniture, especially as juxtaposed against the lighting in the pool and spa area. The striking, modern interior is luxurious and elegantly laid out. Open spaces offer opportunities for time together as a group, while many nooks and crannies are there to be explored, such as the hanging day bed in the hot tub area.

Four exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. Two include en-suite bathrooms, and two share a Jack and Jill. The master suite features a king sized bed, dual-head rain shower, dual vanity, fireplace and terrace. Each bedroom has a television, while the second suite provides direct access to the pool terrace. The third and fourth bedrooms also offer walk-in closets.

During your stay at Villa Cahuilla, you will find plenty of hiking and walking trails close by, while downtown and the best golf course in the valley are just a jaunt away. We recommend this villa for a family holiday, a group of friends or a special celebration such as a wedding or anniversary. Have your vacation, your way in the epitome of Palm Springs, carefully reimagined to foster an exclusive resort experience for only the most discerning guests. The glory of California’s Desert Cities await!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Just minutes from the shops, restaurants, and nightlife of Ketchum’s downtown, this luxurious Mountain home is ready to host your next adventurous vacation. With its central location, you’re never more than a few minutes from ski access, golf courses, hiking, and Main street. Whether you’re planning a family getaway or golf or ski-trip with friends, this mountain home has three luxurious bedrooms and an additional shared bedroom, bringing total accommodations up to twelve.

Borrowing concepts from the traditional American ski lodge, this mountain home uses wood, stone, and cozy furniture to create a warm, welcoming environment. The rustic elements of the design are finely polished, adding a modern, elegant touch. An open concept living room promotes a great social atmosphere, joining the kitchen, dining area, and lounge. Dark wood cabinetry and granite countertops in the kitchen are the perfect contrast to the high-end stainless steel appliances. In the formal dining area, there is space for ten and extra seating at the kitchen breakfast bar.

After dinner, head to the television lounge and settle in for a movie with the family, the “L” shaped couch is extra-cozy and has space for the whole group. You could also take the party out to the terrace, with an alfresco dining set and heat lamps, you can use it all year round.

The master bedroom features a king-sized bed, walk-in closet, jetted tub, balcony, and all of the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. If you need some additional space, there’s an extra room with four twin beds and a sofa bed, great for kids to share or unexpected company.

After you’ve explored Ketchum, take a short drive out of town, and you’ll find plenty of exciting things to do. Bigwood and Elkhorn golf courses are just a few miles away. And for quick and easy ski access, Bald Mountain and Dollar Mountain have chairlifts, both just under two miles from your luxurious alpine vacation home.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This exquisite Ketchum penthouse is located within Chilali, a fabulous complex of condos with five-star amenities just minutes from Sun Valley Resort. Your private, 3,111 square-foot vacation rental is superbly appointed for a winter or summer vacation, featuring spacious living areas, indoor and alfresco dining, and a superb gourmet kitchen. Three ample king bedroom suites plus a kid-friendly bunkroom offer ideal accommodations for families with children and large groups of friends. Additionally, guests enjoy access to the outstanding communal amenities at Chilali, including two rooftop hot tubs, a rooftop dining area with grill, and a well-equipped gym with sauna.

After an exhilarating day on the Sun Valley slopes or hiking trails, enjoy delightful evenings with loved ones in total privacy. The open-concept living room features high ceilings, ample cathedral windows with gorgeous views of Bald Mountain, and a lovely stone hearth with fireplace and mounted flat-screen TV. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and serves a dining table for eight. The deck features a barbeque grill, alfresco dining, and lounge furniture for savoring the summer sun and delicious winter air. Downstairs, the comfy and spacious home theater with vintage décor is perfect for family movie night.

The master suite boasts a king bed, large windows with mountain views, a walk-in closet, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bathtub. The primary guest suite features a king bed and spacious ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, while the other king guest room has access to a hall bathroom. The large bunk room includes four twin bunk beds.

Chilali’s ideal location places you within walking distance of downtown Ketchum and Magic Lantern Cinemas, and you’re an easy drive to Elkhorn Village, Elkhorn Golf Course, and much more. You're within three to five minutes by car (or by Ketchum's free shuttle service) of Bald Mountain, Dollar Mountain, and River Run lodge at Sun Valley Resort. The resort abounds in outdoor sports in all seasons, including downhill and cross-country skiing, snowshoeing, biking, hiking, ice-skating, and fly-fishing.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Comfort, convenience, and breathtaking vistas go hand-in-hand at this sought-after villa. Vaulted timber beam ceilings allow soaring picture windows to look out onto Flat Tops Mountain and the backyard pocket park. Rich hardwood flooring flows alongside sumptuous furnishings and alpine décor. Nearby to the Wildhorse Gondola, you’ll be skiing in and out of this snow capped retreat as you please.

Natural stone and wood architecture complements a modern interior. Plump furniture invites you to kick back après-ski in front of the living room fireplace. Plenty of granite counter space in the kitchen ensures effortless entertaining and room for food prep. Downstairs, a media room features a cozy sectional sofa where you can curl up with a movie. A bar area makes mixing your favourite cocktails a breeze. Sneak away to the quiet office, detailed with birch-patterned wallpaper and a garden view, to catch up on emails.

Drive a mere 7 minutes to reach the town of Steamboat Springs where you’ll find a multitude of dining options, natural hot springs, and adrenaline-pumping activities such as snowmobiling, dog sledding, and the mountain coaster. An on-call winter shuttle is available for Cooper Ski Haus guests to be dropped off at both the mountain and town. With direct access to Trailhead Lodge, a shared swimming pool, game room, and fitness center awaits. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enchanted Hollywood is a stunning 1920s mansion off Laurel Canyon. Located within minutes of myriad iconic Los Angeles attractions, the villa provides exquisite privacy and elegant comfort, with gorgeous alfresco living spaces, luxurious private spa features, and exquisitely decorated, sumptuously appointed interiors. With four deluxe king bedrooms, Enchanted Hollywood gives families, friends, and destination wedding guests a unique yet quintessential taste of Golden Age Hollywood and the unmatched contemporary style of this incomparable, world-class city.

Nestled amid tall trees and garden hedges, the enchanting estate features two tiers of terrace space connected by a lovely spiral stair, ideal for plein-air relaxation and entertainment. Enjoy delicious days lounging on stylish sunbeds while savoring the dreamy waterfall's harmonious sound. Bathe in the brick-lined hot tub, absorb the sauna's therapeutic heat, and plunge into the lagoon-like swimming pool for a refreshing dip. In the afternoon, prepare a classic barbeque lunch and relish it alfresco, and enjoy your evening cocktails on the ample upper terrace overlooking the pool.

Indoors, under the high ceilings and gorgeous chandelier of the luminous great room, open a bottle of fine California wine in the spacious and sumptuous lounge, staying warm by the fireplace. Prepare feasts in the bright, fully equipped kitchen, and gather in the breathtaking dining room. Late at night, retire to the comfy media lounge, where a second fireplace will keep you toasty as you watch your favorite films. Upon waking, enjoy your morning Nespresso in the lovely sun room.

The villa features four spectacular bedrooms suites, all with sumptuous king beds and ensuite bathrooms. The master suite has a private balcony, while bedroom four (the primary guestroom) opens to the terrace near the sauna and hot tub; both have jetted bathtubs in their bathrooms. The master suite, occupying most of the upper floor, includes charming spiral staircases to the attic floor, where you'll find lovely furnished niches for meditation, conversation, or quiet reading.

Along with exquisite privacy, Enchanted Hollywood provides an ideal location for exploring the cultural riches of Los Angeles. The Hollywood Bowl and the Grove are within about three miles, while Universal Studios, Rodeo Drive, the Getty, and Harding Golf Course are among the destinations within minutes of your door.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Step into a California dream at In the Hills. Set in the heart of Beverly Hills, only a few miles from iconic attractions like Rodeo Drive, Universal Studios and the Hollywood Bowl, this luxury vacation rental puts all of greater Los Angeles within your reach. Of course, open-plan contemporary architecture and resort-worthy outdoor living areas make it tempting to stay in and entertain family or friends.

In the Hills opens to a private terrace with a pool, hot tub, sitting and dining areas, and a firepit, all tucked behind mature landscaping. Spend the day enjoying the sun from a lounger by the pool, and the evening listening to a favorite album on the villa’s sound system, watching the Apple TV or sipping a glass of California wine by the indoor gas fireplace.

An open floor plan is perfect for entertaining or simply enjoying the sunshine that floods the interiors. Bays of windows and sleek tile floors in the living and dining room are an understated backdrop for daring modern furnishings such as black leather armchairs, white tuxedo sofas and elegant metal-legged dining chairs around a weighty table. The fully equipped kitchen has its own sitting area, breakfast bar and stylish accents from stainless steel appliances to beautifully patterned stone countertops.

The villa’s four bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, are ideal for groups of friends or couples on holiday together. Relive your honeymoon in the master suite, which has a king bed, dual en-suite bathrooms with a jetted tub, a lounge area with a fireplace, and its own balcony, or enjoy a living area and balcony access from a second bedroom with a king bed. The other two bedrooms have queen beds.

From In the Hills, it’s less than 10 miles to shopping on Rodeo Drive and The Grove, the thrills of Universal Studios, concerts at the Hollywood Bowl and the incredible collection and architecture at the Getty Center. Within 15 miles, you’ll find golf, great hiking trails in Topanga State Park and a choice of beaches where you can surf or stroll the pier.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Registration number: HSR19-002199

listing.listing_description:
Even the pool is a fun nod to one of Orlando’s famous faces at this Florida-modern villa in the Reunion resort community. It’s designed to encourage kids of all ages to play, with a games room, secret playroom, and even an indoor basketball court. A Four Corners location means you’re 9 miles from Disney World and 20 miles from Universal Studios.

After a day chasing deals in Orlando’s shops, or seeking theme-park thrills, unwind on the villa’s backyard patio, where the round swimming pool and hot tub will seem familiar if you’ve spent the day at Disney. Serve dinner from the barbecue at the alfresco table before heading inside for an evening in the games room or the home theater, and let the kids sneak off to the secret playroom while the grown-ups relax with something from the wet bar.

When you’re not on the patio, you’ll want to gather in the great room, which has an open-plan living area, dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. The grown-up bedrooms are a Florida take on contemporary style, with pastels balancing sleek metallic accents. The kids bedrooms, meanwhile, show off the villa’s fun side with brightly colors and unique themes.

For a theme-park day, the villa is just 9 miles to Disney and 20 to Universal.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Rustic luxe interiors and a magnificent landscape make Monte Video an unforgettable retreat in the heart of the Rockies. Just a few miles from downtown Breckenridge, where you’ll find skiing, sledding and shopping, the villa boasts panoramic mountain views from nearly every room. Four bedrooms and extras like a billiards room and wine cellar make the property ideal for family getaways or ski trips with friends.

If you’re visiting at the height of ski season, you’ll appreciate the villa’s heated parking, hot tub and gas fireplace. After a day of skiing or boarding, gather around a favorite movie in the media room, challenge friends and family at the billiards table or enjoy a tasting in the wine cellar. In the summer, prep dinner on the barbecue and spend the evening watching the stars come out from the al-fresco dining area and deck.

Natural tones and textures make Monte Video feel like part of the Colorado landscape. Vaulted ceilings, exposed beams and a dramatic two-story stone fireplace are classic lodge features in the living room, while a cream-colored rug and sofa and leather club chairs invite guests to make themselves comfortable. Wood floors and thick beams give the dining room a more intimate feel, though its mountain views can only be described as expansive. The fully equipped kitchen is a dream for cooks and diners alike, with a large range and convenient breakfast bar.

Two king bedrooms, two queen bedrooms—all with en-suite bathrooms—and a queen sofa bed can comfortably accommodate up to ten guests. The master suite, on the main floor, has a king bed, jetted tub and fireplace and opens to the deck. The second king bedroom is on the upper story. On the lower level, you’ll find the two queen bedrooms.

From Monte Video’s beautiful setting, it’s just a short drive to the best of Breckenridge: 5 miles to the shops, restaurants and galleries of historic Main Street, 5.5 miles to the BreckConnect gondola, 6 miles to sledding and tubing at Carter Park and 6.5 miles to skating at Breckenridge Ice Arena. At the end of your stay, plan on a 107-mile drive from the villa to Denver International Airport.

Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Business License Number: 001248

Take a Colorado ski holiday to the next level at Cabin on the Ridge. A cabin in name only, this luxury property looks down over the Telluride area from a perch that’s only accessible by gondola. Its incredible amenities, both private and shared, and four bedrooms make it feel like a resort that’s just for you and your party of eight.

The cabin has its own outdoor living areas with mountain views and a hot tub, barbecue, al-fresco dining for six and a fireplace. Inside, you’ll find a media room, cable TV, Sonos sound system, Wi-Fi and even an oxygen system, so you can breathe as easily as you would at lower altitudes. Guests are also welcome to use the heated pool, hot tub, exercise room and theater at the nearby Ridge Club.

Rustic on the outside, elegant on the inside, this vacation rental truly elevates mountain-lodge style. It’s laid out around an open-concept great room whose picture windows perfectly frame the views and whose stone fireplace makes a cozy focal point. The living area and fully equipped kitchen are open to each other; sit down for special-occasion meals in the adjacent formal dining room.

Cabin on the Ridge has three bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own jetted tub and balcony, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

The cabin’s secluded location means you can spend your stay with just friends and family for company. But with the Telluride free gondola only a 50-yard walk from your front door, it’s also easy to access skiing, shopping and dining in both Mountain Village and downtown Telluride. If you’ll be visiting outside ski season, plan to tee off at the nearby Telluride Golf Course or take a day trip to the picturesque Alta Lakes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Air, earth, fire, and water all come together in this sleek, ultra-modern home. After a busy LA day, jump in the lap pool, get the kinks out in the hot tub, then kick back on a lounger with a cold drink to wait for the relaxation to begin. The chef is prepping hors d’oeuvres, followed with barbecued steaks, lobster tails, and salads. The only thing needed is an appetite. Meanwhile, the bartender is setting up, and the playlist is downloading onto the house music system.

The Beverly Modern Estate is a Hollywood Hills statement of less is more. The furniture is as modern as the home is minimal. Socializing is natural as everything is open concept. Conversations can move as quickly as people from one level to the next. The entertainment balcony has a full-sized pool table, pack the cue. Evenings, the waterfall, pools, and open fire make a dramatic statement. Lots of decks, one on the rooftop, provide couches and lounge areas. Greenery, trees, and ivy cover the walls for privacy.

Everything is within a short drive from here. Afterall, this is LA, baby.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Fold wall-to-wall balcony doors open and fill trendy interiors with fresh mountain air and sea breeze from the coast of Rancho Palos Verdes. Lookout out over scenic vistas of California’s rugged coast, bluffs, and the Pacific. In the evening, sink into a leather armchair next to the fireplace and watch the sunset. Then, head to the ocean-front bars of Redondo Beach.

From the back wall kitchen, you’ll have a clear gaze out of the ocean-side wall, as well as a barrier-free connection to the rest of the group in the living room. Hardwood floors, designers furnishings, and California-inspired works of art connect each area beneath Maritime’s peaked-ceiling. Outside, you’ll find a small sitting area with a sofa, sun loungers, and a fire pit.

Located within the peninsula’s gated-community, you’ll travel down a private road to access the villa, where 2 garage parking spots await. When you’re not enjoying the view, check what’s on cable or Smart TV. Or you could turn up the sound system, fire up the grill, and throw an afternoon barbeque. There’s also an office space if you feel like keeping up with the rest of the World.

If you’re traveling with kids, Disneyland and Universal studios are always exciting options. For the bigger kids, spend a romantic evening at Balboa Pier. Have a burger and milkshake at Ruby’s Diner, play some classic arcade games, then hit the Ferris wheel. Closer to home, Cabrillo Pier is an incredible walk 1200-feet out into the Pacific, and its 2 beaches are perfect for swimming and surfing.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
